listitem.synopsis: PRINT thing PR thing (PRINT thing1 thing2 ...) (PR thing1 thing2 ...)

listitem.para: Prints the input or inputs to the current write stream (initially the command-recall window). All the inputs are printed on a single line, separated by spaces, ending with a newline. If an input is a list, square brackets are not printed around it, but brackets are printed around sublists. Braces are always printed around arrays.

listitem.programlisting: PRINT [Hello how are you] Hello how are you
